title: RPG / FANTASY MUSIC PACK
description: Epic/Fantasy Music Pack is a music library perfect for fantasy strategy and RPG games but not only.
longDescription:
Preview: youtu.be/jRJGRplTP7k

Soundcloud Preview: soundcloud.com/dragon-music-productions/epicfantasy-music-pack/s-WCydz


Rpg/Epic/Fantasy Music Pack is a music library perfect for fantasy , strategy and RPG games but not only . From heroic and battle tracks to medieval and folk tune tracks , Epic/Fantasy Music Pack will cover all of your game music needs for sure!


Tracks :

1. Main Title (1:28) - Epic / Heroic

2. Dream City (1:02) - Ambient / Background

3. Monster Battle (1:00) - Epic / Action / Battle

4. At The Pirate's Tavern (1.08) - Folk / Medieval

5. Ghost City (1:14) - Ambient / Background

6. Ship And Sea (0:44) - Epic / Heroic

7. Liberty City (1:28) - Ambient / Background

8. The Sword Of The Pirate (0:57) - Epic / Action / Battle

9. Magic City (1:12) - Ambient / Background

10. Women Food And Wine (1:01) - Folk / Medieval

11. The Flag (1:06) - Epic / Action / Battle

12. Tavern Wine (1:13) - Folk / Medieval

13. Pirate City (1:24) - Ambient / Background

14. The Bard's Song (1:03) - Folk / Medieval
technicalDetails:
Total number of audio/music tracks : 32 (original + loops , total running time : 25.42)
